alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:30PM EDT until August 05 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WASHINGTON AND EAST CENTRAL HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Deblois, or 10 miles northwest of Cherryfield, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Deblois, Mariaville, Eastbrook, Amherst, Aurora and Beddington. This includes State Highway 9 near Junction 193. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
